mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_launching( launching_code, member_id, launching_brand, launching_enter, launching_business_reg_num, launching_manager, launching_phone, launching_address, launching_content, launching_hwp, launching_url, launching_file, launching_datetime, launching_approval )VALUES( 'lch_009' ,'id019' ,'fire' ,'(주)불' ,'459-12-58939' ,'홍대표' ,'01012340009' ,'전라북도 전주시 호성동' ,'전국에서 제일 싱싱한 식품입니다' ,'sys/A/B/D/입점회사/d.hwp' ,'http://fire.com' ,'sys/A/B/E4.사업제안서' ,NOW() ,'Y' );
mapper.select: SELECT launching_code AS sellerCODE ,member_id AS sellerID ,launching_brand AS sellerBRAND ,launching_enter AS sellerENTER ,launching_Business_reg_num AS sellerNUM ,launching_manager AS sellerMANAGER ,launching_phone AS sellerPHONE ,launching_address AS sellerADD ,launching_content AS sellerCONTENT ,launching_hwp AS sellerHWP ,launching_url AS sellerURL ,launching_file AS sellerFILE ,launching_datetime AS sellerDATE ,launching_approval AS sellerAPP FROM tb_launching AS launching;
